name: Emily is at the Zoo
description:
Project Lunar Marathon

I am making 22 games in 26 months, all 2D single player, all with only 1 month dev time each (plus breaks). Keep up with everything on the youtube playlist or join the discord for weekly devlogs and other updates. 

 If you are on my Patreon you will be able to see the devlogs and the games 1 week early. Leopard Seal patrons also get the code for the games!

This game uses Godot Engine, available under MIT licence 

Music:

"Porch Swing Days - slower" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
